com.satori.rtm.model

Class Pdu<TBody>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.satori.rtm.model.Pdu<TBody>
  • Type Parameters:
    TBody - type of the user-specified payload
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PduRaw

    public class Pdu<TBody>
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Protocol Data Unit (PDU).

    A PDU contains JSON written with an RTM-specific syntax. Clients and RTM communicate with each other using information in PDUs. Each PDU is encoded into a single WebSocket frame.

    Sample PDU Specification 

     {
    "action": "<service>/<operation>/<outcome>",
    "body": {
         "channel": ChannelName,
         "message": JSONValue
    },
    "id": RequestId OPTIONAL
 }

    • Method Detail

      • getBody

        public TBody getBody()
        Returns the body of the PDU. The body is the body element in the PDU.
        Returns:
        PDU body, or null if the PDU doesn't contain a payload.

      • getAction

        public java.lang.String getAction()
        Returns the action element of the PDU.
        Returns:
        a String containing the action

      • getId

        public java.lang.String getId()
        Returns the identifier (id) element of the PDU.
        Returns:
        a string containing the id

      • isUnsolicited

        public boolean isUnsolicited()
        Returns true if the PDU is an unsolicited PDU from RT and false otherwise.

        An unsolicited PDU doesn't have an identifier (id) and isn't a response to a request from the client. It either contains a message published to the channel, or it's an error PDU sent by RTM.

        Returns:
        returns true if the PDU is unsolicited, otherwise false.

      • isSystemError

        public boolean isSystemError()
        Returns true if the PDU is a system error from RTM and false otherwise. This type of error usually indicates an internal error within RTM.

        Respond to this type of error by disconnecting and reconnecting the client.

        Returns:
        returns true if the PDU is a system error, otherwise false.

      • isOkOutcome

        public boolean isOkOutcome()
        Returns true if the PDU is a positive response to a request sent by the application, and false otherwise. The action element of a positive response PDU ends with the string "/ok", for example, "rtm/publish/ok".
        Returns:
        returns true if the PDU is a positive response, otherwise false.

      • isErrorOutcome

        public boolean isErrorOutcome()
        Returns true if the PDU is a negative response to a request sent by the application, and false otherwise. The action element of a negative response PDU ends with the string "/error", for example, "rtm/publish/error".
        Returns:
        returns true if the PDU is a negative response, otherwise false.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
